CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 10, 1962, pg. 24 reads: "New Steeler - Bob Ferguson, All-American fullback from Ohio State and a new member of the Pittsburgh Steelers, visited Pittsburgh for the first time, Sunday, when he attended the Dapper Dan sports banquet. Ferguson, who was one of numerous honored guests at the affair, is shown with Ohio State assistant coach Harry Strodel."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Steelers football player Bob Ferguson talking to Ohio State assistant coach Harry Strodel during Dapper Dan banquet in Kings Garden, Hilton Hotel
